Welcome to the online home of Cleveland Bike Polo, the city's most exclusive (read: only) hardcourt bike polo organization!

Cleveland Bike Polo is a diverse group, ranging in age from teenagers to 40-somethings, with varying professions and interests. We encourage anyone with a bike to come down and play, there will always be extra mallets for you to borrow.

We play at the Gordon Park tennis courts off of RT2 (take the 72nd ST EXIT) on Sundays at Noon. Click here for a link to the map. When the days get longer we also play on Thursdays around 6pm. When we play we'll most likely post it on our facebook page, but if you start coming you'll be put on our call/text list.

Our organization has teams that compete all around the country, but most of our members typically play for fun/exercise/something to do outdoors.

We welcome anyone from all walks of life, so when you have a few hours free on a Sunday come check us out!

Want more information on Hardcourt Bike Polo? Click on the links below:
